title: What do you call Riot Lyte burning a toxic player.

replies.body: That pun was so bad it made me grin. Have an upvote
It made me {{champion:202}}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LkIWmsP3c_s

This is the only song he listens to while playing League.

What do you call a coward in hiding?

Riot Lyte
There is always that one guy who won't let go of his dislike for something so he has to ruin it for someone else

> [{quoted}](name=billxx,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FlBnN8QE,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-05-03T18:44:53.053+0000)
>
> There is always that one guy who won't let go of his dislike for something so he has to ruin it for someone else

You're right, Lyte couldn't let go of his dislike for fun games so he kept adding bad features until it was ruined, then went into hiding when people were upset about what he implemented.

I agree completely.
Doesn't lyte work in player behaviour? You're one of those guys that think toxicity shouldn't be bannable right?

> [{quoted}](name=billxx,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FlBnN8QE,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-03T21:58:04.845+0000)
>
> Doesn't lyte work in player behaviour? You're one of those guys that think toxicity shouldn't be bannable right?

Not really, more concerned with his additions to league like Dynamic queue, automated tribunal, and reporting (if you even played then)
 
Literally never had any problems with players before he implemented reporting into the game, after that its been a passive aggressive tiltfest that increased toxicity plenty.

How many times a day do you hear "9x that, 9x this, report that report this reported!" Yea it was all started by Lyte.

Omg you don't know how a company works. Those would not solely be his decision. Those large decisions would be made by a group of people. Also, he's the lightning rod for people like you who aren't satisfied until there is a face to blame

> [{quoted}](name=billxx,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FlBnN8QE,comment-id=000800000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-03T23:33:13.500+0000)
>
> Omg you don't know how a company works. Those would not solely be his decision. Those large decisions would be made by a group of people. Also, he's the lightning rod for people like you who aren't satisfied until there is a face to blame

then why has he been in hiding for months now? Seems Riot has finally sick of him too.
You don't know, and neither do I. If I had to guess, I would say either family issues or he left by himself. Or, maybe it's the death threats he gets.

> [{quoted}](name=billxx,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FlBnN8QE,comment-id=00080000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T14:08:56.259+0000)
>
> You don't know, and neither do I. If I had to guess, I would say either family issues or he left by himself. Or, maybe it's the death threats he gets.

Right we both have no idea for sure. So you can stop berating me and being no better than the toxic players you harp on about. Count how many personal attacks you've made against me for a simple pun comment and feel bad or just be a hypocrite, either way.
What did us not knowing where he is have anything to do with this? Also, your "simple pun comment" was rude, insensitive, and ignorant

> [{quoted}](name=Gotodead,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FlBnN8QE,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-05-03T17:56:15.527+0000)
>
> What do you call a coward in hiding?
> 
> Gotodead

ftfy

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FlBnN8QE,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2016-05-03T22:44:11.518+0000)
>
> ftfy

Not hiding, im right here. Lyte on the other hand, pretty absent :)
Burning something toxic would release it into the atmosphere and then it would rain down into acid rain... oh look, it's the League community in a nutshell...

Toxic players always ruin the mood and the atmosphere.


Thank god Riot Lyte is always here to.... Lyte-n the mood B)
Phreak-grade pun alert.
Excuses won't be taken Lytely
We used to call 'em Lyte Smites back when he still did it a lot.  Often in the evenings.  Does that make him a Night Lyte?
Incompetent.
then you got sued by blizzard cause firebats
{{summoner:11}} & {{summoner:14}}

What does Lyte say when he disciplines 3 toxic players?

{{champion:41}} : Three in a row
+1 because as I read it, I heard it in the voice of the firebat.
PH D

A RIOT Lyter.

Or a friend.
Riot ignyte

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroki Kemono,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FlBnN8QE,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-03T14:26:32.094+0000)
>
> Lyte em up

And I thought you were going to say Riot Lyte is a flamer.  hue hue.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  Really?
Uuuuugh...

... Save for the fact that Lyte hasn't been working for over two months, and likely never will again at Riot.

(Good riddance.)

Im not a fan of Lyte. He's just another bully himself. It's absolutely unprofessional how he posts chat logs to justify himself and how he thinks punishment after the fact will solve any of League's problems.
